1.20.1.1.1.0:
Added: Create support:
	Ooze Cauldrons can now be emptied via pump.
	Ooze now has fluid interactions inside pipes.
Added: api methods so other mods can register their own ooze bottle world interactions.
Added: Dispensers can place Ooze Buckets, collect Ooze bottles and convert Mud to Chorloam.
Added: Frost Walker gives level-based resistance to the cold from walking on Glacium/Frostburn Ice.
Added: Ooze Cauldrons now give comparator output.
Changed: Now depends on Oblivion 2.0.0.
Changed: Made all mixins abstract.
Changed: Bone meal can no longer grow Cerulean Stalk infinitely.
Fixed: Added a recipe to convert existing Adamantite Knives into a new Adamantite Knife that actually behaves like Farmer's Delight knives.
Fixed: Ooze Fluid interaction inconsistencies.
Fixed: Xenon bomb not disappearing when not damaging the entity it hit (infinite flashbang).
Fixed: Cauldrons filled with other fluids being able to be filled by Ooze Rain.
Fixed: Dripstone dripping significantly faster than in vanilla.
1.20.1.1.2.0:
Added: Create compat crushed ore items.
Added: Cerulean/Indigo Signs & Boats.
Changed: Void Leviathan can now be enabled again via config.
Changed: Added some modded biomes to the tags determining bismuth coloration (so they won't use the default of Verdant).
Changed: Mod logo.
Changed: Now depends on Oblivion 2.1.0.
Changed: License.
Removed: Enlightend's Compatibility tab, since it is now useless.
Fixed: Fumesplats not dropping Splatter Glands.
Fixed: Cache advancement resource locations.
